basic.description: Overview of instrumental methods of chemical analysis. Topics include gas and liquid chromatography, mass spectrometric detection, new separation methods, electrochemical analysis, inductively coupled plasma-based elemental analysis.
basic.subject: ENCH
basic.title: Instrumental Chemical Analysis

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQ: ENCH 213 OR CHEM 213 and registered in BSCE
EXCLUSION: ENSC 471
